abilities.title: Inquisitorius
abilities.text: When a character in another allied  Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted character is within 4 of a character in this Unit, the target Unit gains .

abilities.title: Protection
abilities.text: While a character in this Unit is contesting one or more Active objectives, it has  and Steadfast .
